episode_event_academy_academy02/8301_100: Yo! It’s exam time—and this one’s important!
Let’s see how hot your spirit burns!
episode_event_academy_academy02/8302_100:
Welcome. My name is Glacia of the Hoenn
Elite Four. I’ll be conducting your exam today.

Now, how confident are you? It would please me
to no end if I could go all out against you!
episode_event_academy_academy02/8303_100:
Let me show you some moves I’m proud of.
I’ve taken direct hits from them myself!
episode_event_academy_academy02/8304_100:
If you win, I’ll give you a small token of
acknowledgment. It should help with your studies.
